snippet: Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray won their opening matches in straight sets at the Western & Southern Open in Mason, Ohio.
abstract: Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray win their opening matches at the Western & Southern Open tennis tournament; other results noted.

headline.seo: Djokovic and Murray Advance in Ohio
